title: Best of The Program | Guest: John Ziegler | 12/15/20
description:
A new report doesn’t look good for Dominion voting machines in Michigan, but is it too late since the Electoral College has already voted for Joe Biden? Mediaite’s John Ziegler asks the 10 most important COVID-related questions the media is ignoring. Glenn hears from listeners about where they feel the Right should go next. We need a leader, whether it’s Trump or someone else. The time has come to stand up and open your business.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
